alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Mifflin; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HUNTINGDON... NORTHEASTERN MIFFLIN AND SOUTHEASTERN CENTRE COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near State College, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Boalsburg, Milroy, Centre Hall, Millheim, Aaronsburg, Spring Mills, Coburn, Madisonburg, Whipple Dam State Park, Mcalevys Fort, Potters Mills, Seven Mountains, Poe Valley State Park, Siglerville, Tussey Mountain Ski Area and Pennsylvania Military Museum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
